check.name: Header
check.description:
Checks that a source file begins with a specified header. Property {@code headerFile} specifies a file that contains the required header. Alternatively, the header specification can be set directly in the {@code header} property without the need for an external file.

In default configuration, if header is not specified, the default value of header is set to {@code null} and the check does not rise any violations.

property.name: charset
property.description: Specify the character encoding to use when reading the headerFile.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify the file extensions of the files to process.

property.name: header
headerFile
property.description: Specify the name of the file containing the required header.

property.name: ignoreLines
property.description: Specifies the line numbers to ignore when matching lines in a content of headerFile.
